org.ccnx.ccn.impl.sync.ProtocolBasedSyncMonitor

org.ccnx.ccn.impl.sync.ProtocolBasedSyncMonitor Class Reference

Detailed Description

Snoops on the sync protocol to report new files seen by sync on a slice to a registered handler.

boolean org.ccnx.ccn.impl.sync.ProtocolBasedSyncMonitor.handleInterest ( Interest  interest  ) 

We have seen a new hash.

Feed it into the compare process to discover possible new unseen files.

Implements org.ccnx.ccn.CCNInterestHandler.

void org.ccnx.ccn.impl.sync.ProtocolBasedSyncMonitor.registerCallback ( CCNSyncHandler  syncHandler,
ConfigSlice  slice,
byte[]  startHash,
ContentName  startName 
) throws IOException [virtual]

Register callback and output a root advise interest to start the process of looking at sync hashes to find new files.

We also start looking at interests for root advises on this slice which are used to notice new hashes coming through which may contain unseen files.

Implements org.ccnx.ccn.impl.sync.SyncMonitor.
